title: IDA command bar default language
content:
The command bar at the bottom of the output window in IDA defaults to python. I would greatly prefer it to default to IDC, is there a way to change this default? I found one reference to 
RunPlugin("python",4)
in the idapython github repo, but it's not clear where it should be used. Adding the following line to plugins.cfg also has no effect. 
;plugin_name                     filename    hotkey  arg  flags
;------------------------------- ----------  ------  ---  --------
python                           python       0       3

answers_data.content:
After setting the CLI language to IDC by clicking on the button to the left of the CLI, right click in the CLI input area and click the option marked 
Default CLI
